description.raw:
* added com to the object menu

* added inertial information to user data

* added com materials

* cleaning the code

* cleaning comments

This PR still has a problem that is consuming quite some time, any commenting or pointing out problems or recommendations to make my messy code better would be really appreciated.

the problem: 
since I'm adding the sphere [center of mass] to the link, any change on the model is reflect on it, like transparency and wire frame like those two images

![table.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/dLyK6y/images/196823832-table.png)

![tabletrans.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/dLyK6y/images/766770272-tabletrans.png)

I believe I'm using the same pattern used in ```viewJoints```, that is what puzzling me.
